attributes.action: Make the Army and Navy flyover, in Chelmsford, two lanes to ease traffic
attributes.background:
The current flyover is a single lane and was only supposed to be temporary. 

Let’s lnock it down and make a double lane fly over so traffic can flow in both directions in and out of Chelmsford.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to be about something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for. This would be the responsibility of Essex County Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition Essex County Council. You can find details of their petitions system here:

http://www.essex.gov.uk/Your-Council/Consultation-Feedback/Pages/Petitions.aspx
